025package net.sf.iptablesJava.connection;
026
027import java.util.HashMap;
028import java.util.Map;
029
030/**
031 * This task will be notified on connection events by netfilter
032 */
033class NetFilterConnTask extends Thread {
034
035        Map<Long, Connection> connections = new HashMap<Long, Connection>();
036
037        boolean terminate = false;
038
039        static {
040                System.loadLibrary("iptables-java");
041        }
042
043        public NetFilterConnTask() {
044                init();
045        }
046
047        @Override
048        public void run() {
049        }
050        
051        private void handleConnectionEvent() {
052        }
053
054        /**
055         * Initialize the netfilter listener
056         */
057        private native void init();
058
059        /**
060         * Deinitialize the netfilter listener
061         */
062        private native void deinit();
063
064        /**
065         * @return Get the connection object associated to the specified id or
066         *         create a new one
067         */
068        public Connection getConnection(String connectionID_s) {
069                Long connectionID = Long.parseLong(connectionID_s);
070                Connection conn = connections.get(connectionID);
071                if (conn == null) {
072                        conn = new Connection(connectionID);
073                        connections.put(connectionID, conn);
074                }
075                return conn;
076        }
077
078        // Called from native code for new connection notification
079        private void notifyNewConnection(Object newConnection) {
080                if (newConnection instanceof Connection) {
081                        for (ConnectionListener l : ConnTracker.connectionListeners)
082                                l.onConnectionStarted((Connection) newConnection);
083                }
084        }
085
086        // Called from native code for updated connection notification
087        private void notifyUpdatedConnection(Object updatedConnection) {
088                if (updatedConnection instanceof Connection)
089                        for (ConnectionListener l : ConnTracker.connectionListeners)
090                                l.onConnectionStateChanged((Connection) updatedConnection);
091        }
092
093        // Called from native code for terminated connection notification
094        private void notifyTerminatedConnection(Object terminatedConnection) {
095                if (!(terminatedConnection instanceof Connection))
096                        return;
097
098                for (ConnectionListener l : ConnTracker.connectionListeners)
099                        l.onConnectionTerminated((Connection) terminatedConnection);
100
101                connections.remove(((Connection) terminatedConnection).getId());
102        }
103
104        /**
105         * Signal to unregister for notifications
106         */
107        public void requestTerminate() {
108                this.terminate = true;
109        }
110
111        /**
112         * @return True if this task is terminated or a termination request is
113         *         pending
114         */
115        public boolean isTerminated() {
116                return terminate;
117        }
118
119}
